abilities.name: MITOSIS
abilities.description: Your space docks cannot produce infantry. At the start of the status phase, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on any planet you control.

flagship.name: Duha Menaimon
abilities: After you activate this system, you may produce up to 5 units in this system.

base.name: Stymie
base.effect: ACTION: Place this card face up in your play area. While this card is in your play area, the Arborec player cannot produce units in or adjacent to non-home systems that contain 1 or more of your units.
base.returnCondition: If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Arborec player's units, return this card to the Arborec player.

omega.name: Stymie
omega.effect: After another player moves ships into a system that contains 1 or more of your units: You may place 1 command token from that player's reinforcements in any non-home system.
omega.returnCondition: Then, return this card to the Arborec player.

base.name: Letani Ospha
base.ability: ACTION: Exhaust this card and choose a player's non-fighter ship; that player may replace that ship with one from their reinforcements that costs up to 2 more than the replaced ship.

base.name: Dirzuga Rophal
base.unlockCondition: Have 12 Ground Forces on Planets you control
base.ability: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your units that have PRODUCTION: You may produce 1 unit in that system.

base.name: Letani Miasmiala
base.ability: ACTION: Produce any number of units in any number of systems that contain 1 or more of your ground forces. Then purge this card.
